channel.title: Command that sets a players coord at next log-in [639] [Dementhium]
channel.description:
Some people on my server have been going to bugged areas and so when they try to log in they get bugged, can somebody give me a command where i can type like ::fix <playername> and it would teleport that player ON OR OFFLINE to the specific coordinates set in the player.teleport for their next log in rather then be in the orignally bugged place.. I really need this asap
if somebody can help me that would be wonderful
thank you for your time and seeming consideration
